text: John Michael Murphy (August 3, 1926 â€“ May 25, 2015) was an American politician. He was a member of the U.S. House of Representatives from New York serving from 1963 through 1981. Murphy died the age of 88 on May 25, 2015, at a Staten Island hospital. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:United States representatives from New York (state) Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
